import React, { useState } from 'react' const CheckoutShipping = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userInfo')); const allData = ((user.name != null && user.name !== '') && (user.lastName != null && user.lastName !== '') && (user.rut != null && user.rut !== '') && (user.phone != null && user.phone !== '') && (user.email != null && user.email !== '')) const haveAdrress = user.shippingAddress != null && user.shippingAddress.length > 0; let [name, setName] = useState(''); let [lastName, setLastName] = useState(''); let [rut, setRut] = useState(''); let [phone, setPhone] = useState(''); let [email, setEmail] = useState(''); let [address, setAddress] = useState(''); let [address2, setAddress2] = useState(''); let [city, setCity] = useState(''); let [region, setRegion] = useState(''); let [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(''); let [additional, setAdditional] = useState(''); const ShippingVisitForm = () => { setName = (text) => { name = text } setLastName = (text) => { lastName = text } setRut = (text) => { rut = text } setPhone = (text) => { phone = text } setEmail = (text) => { email = text } setAddress = (text) => { address = text } setAddress2 = (text) => { address2 = text } setCity = (text) => { city = text } setRegion = (text) => { region = text } setPostalCode = (text) => { postalCode = text } setAdditional = (text) => { additional = text } return ( <>

); } const maxAddress = 4; const addressQty = user.shippingAddress.length;; let actualAddress = 0 const cardAddres = (address) => { actualAddress++; const selectRadio = (alias) => { const radioButtons = document.querySelector(`input[id="${alias}"]`); radioButtons.select(); radioButtons.checked = true; } if (actualAddress <= maxAddress) { return ( <>

{actualAddress === addressQty && actualAddress < maxAddress ? : <>} ); } }; const UserComplete = (props) => { const user = props.user; // setName (user.name) // setLastName (user.lastName) // setRut (user.rut) // setPhone (user.phone) // setEmail (user.phone) setName = () => { name = user.name; } setLastName = () => { lastName = user.lastName } setRut = () => { rut = user.rut } setPhone = () => { phone = user.phone } setEmail = () => { email = user.email } return ( <>
